mapper.select: SELECT cd_id, reg_date, reqUid, rtn_type, res_cd, user_id, camp_id, push_log_id, clk_id, tb_click_id FROM PUSH_CAMPAIGN_DETAIL

SELECT user_id, mobile, reg_date, res_cd, send, 'read', click FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, d.mobile, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') reg_date, a.res_cd, a.rtn_type send, b.rtn_type `read`, c.rtn_type click FROM (select camp_id, user_id, reqUid, res_cd, rtn_type, reg_date FROM push_campaign_detail WHERE rtn_type = 'S') AS a
LEFT JOIN (select user_id, reqUid, rtn_type, reg_date from push_campaign_detail WHERE rtn_type = 'R') AS b ON a.reqUid = b.reqUid
LEFT JOIN (select user_id, reqUid, rtn_type, reg_date from push_campaign_detail where rtn_type = 'C') AS c ON a.reqUid = c.reqUid
JOIN app_user as d ON a.user_id=d.user_id
WHERE camp_id=#{camp_id} GROUP BY a.user_id ) AS tb
WHERE mobile like CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')
ORDER BY res_cd ASC ORDER BY click DESC
LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT count(user_id) FROM ( SELECT a.user_id, d.mobile, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') reg_date, a.res_cd, a.rtn_type send, b.rtn_type `read`, c.rtn_type click FROM (select camp_id, user_id, reqUid, res_cd, rtn_type, reg_date FROM push_campaign_detail WHERE rtn_type = 'S') AS a
LEFT JOIN (select user_id, reqUid, rtn_type, reg_date from push_campaign_detail WHERE rtn_type = 'R') AS b ON a.reqUid = b.reqUid
LEFT JOIN (select user_id, reqUid, rtn_type, reg_date from push_campaign_detail where rtn_type = 'C') AS c ON a.reqUid = c.reqUid
JOIN app_user as d ON a.user_id=d.user_id
WHERE camp_id=#{camp_id} GROUP BY a.user_id ) AS tb
WHERE mobile like CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')
SELECT b.tg_mobile, DATE_FORMAT(b.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%s') reg_date, b.error_code FROM push_campaign_detail a JOIN sms_detail b ON a.cd_id = b.cd_id WHERE a.camp_id=${camp_id}
